name: MultiSender
description: `MultiSender` is a contract for sending ERC20 Tokens to multiple addresses.

functionDecorators.name: multiERC20Transfer
functionDecorators.description: Send ERC20 tokens to multiple contracts using two arrays which includes the address and the amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _addresses
parameterDecorators.description: Array of addresses to send to.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of token amounts to send.
